<title>Who has the most race kilometres?</title>
<base href="https://www.procyclingstats.com/rankings.php">
<link rel="canonical" href="https://www.procyclingstats.com/rankings/me/distance">
<script async="" src="https://tags.refinery89.com/v2/procyclingstats.js"></script><meta name="description" content="Cycling is about endurance, and the total of race distance done is a big thing. This season so far it is Cesare Benedetti who has the most kilometres to his name, 14784 in total. He is followed by Danny van Poppel (13592 km) and Max Walscheid (13550 km).">

<div class="text-regular">Summation of KMs from January 1. DNFs are counted at 50% of race distance. Last update: [minutes_ago] minutes ago.</div>
